metadata.dc:author: Martín-Moro, M
González-Herrada, C
Hernanz-Hermosa, J M
Villanueva-Osorio, J
Bueno-Marco, C
Casanova-Seuma, J M
metadata.dc:description: We report two new cases of ataxia-telangiectasia (A-T) in two child brothers. The first symptom of the disease was a serious and prolonged pellagra-like photodermatitis. This rare manifestation of the has not be reported before and it could be explain by a defect in DNA repair.
metadata.dc:title: Fotodermatitis prolongada y severa, una manifestación precoz de la ataxia-telangiectasia.
[Prolonged and severe photodermatitis, an early manifestation of ataxia telangiectasia].
